caption.p: Late winter (JFM) CMIP5 mean response (10‐model subset) in near‐surface temperature (K) in (a) the RCP8.5 scenario and (b) AMIPsst+co2. (c) Figure 4a minus Figure 4b. The other panels are the same as Figures 4a– 4c but (d–f) for the mean sea level pressure (hPa), (g–i) for the geopotential height at 500 hPa (m), and (j–l) for the zonal wind at 850 hPa (m s −1). In Figures 4j and 4k the gray lines show the 4 m s −1 (outer) and 8 m s −1 (inner) mean zonal wind in the historical and AMIP simulations, respectively. Stippling indicates areas where the response has the same sign in at least 90% of the models.
